name: Bracers of Destruction
flavorText: “These bracers appear to utilize primal forces channeled from the ground itself. Interesting, to say the least.” -Abd al-hazir
flavorTextHtml: “These bracers appear to utilize primal forces channeled from the ground itself. Interesting, to say the least.” -Abd al-hazir

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [4.5 - 6.0]%

secondary.textHtml: Seismic Slam deals 442% increased damage to the first 10 enemies it hits. (Barbarian Only) [400 - 500]%
